lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "If there's that much of a discrepancy between prices for one country and another, producers may be teted to get rid of their stocks of coffee by selling to non-member nations and by circumventing the quota provisions," said Paine Webber analyst Bernie Savaiko.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Customs can do a good job when given the tools, but when its hands are tied, it doesn't have the authority to demand Form O (documents tracking merchandise from source to destination)," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. government until Congress approves the monitoring authority, but if coffee arrives without valid certification, it will still be allowed entry.
